volunteer_experience.info: I mentor the winning teams to help bring their startup ideas to fruition. Ideation Brasil's goal is to empower Brazilian college entrepreneurs by hosting entrepreneurship competitions in universities all over the country. In 2014, it organized an entrepreneurship competition, which took place in 5 cities in Brazil and gathered more than 500 students from 34 universities, that launched 70 startups.Check out this entrepreneurial organization at www.ideationbrasil.com.br
